description: Scientists from TU Dresden have created a laser drill that vaporises ice to reach potential subsurface oceans on Europa and Enceladus. Lighter and more energy-efficient than mechanical drills, it enables deep exploration with minimal power, paving the way for studying icy worlds and their potential for extraterrestrial life.
title: German Scientists Develop Laser Drill to Explore Icy Moons’ Hidden Oceans

description: In a breakthrough study, scientists merged data from Japan’s T2K and the U.S. NOvA neutrino experiments to explore why matter exists in the universe. The findings improve measurements of neutrino behavior and may help reveal whether these particles break symmetry with antimatter, offering vital clues to how the universe survived after the Big Bang.
title: Ghostly Neutrinos May Hold the Answer to Why Matter Exists in Our Universe

description: Japan’s Akatsuki spacecraft, which studied Venus for nearly a decade, has been declared inoperable by JAXA. Successfully orbiting in 2015 after an initial failure, Akatsuki uncovered major insights into Venus’s swirling clouds and atmosphere. Its mission’s end leaves a gap until NASA’s VERITAS and DAVINCI+ missions take over.
title: Japan’s Akatsuki Spacecraft Declared Inoperable, Marking End of Dedicated Venus Missions

description: Written and directed by Varsha Bharath, Bad Girl is a Tamil drama movie that is set to land on the digital screens soon. It has been produced by Anurag Kashyap.
title: Bad Girl OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch This Tamil Movie Online

description: Starring Ashwin Kumar, Dhoolpet Police Station is an upcoming crime thriller series that is set to launch soon on the OTT platform. The series will explore themes of investigation, crime, and power.
title: Dhoolpet Police Station OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch This Upcoming Crime Series Online

description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope has created the first-ever 3D atmospheric map of an exoplanet, revealing the extreme conditions on WASP-18b, an “ultra-hot Jupiter” located 400 light-years away. Using infrared eclipse mapping, scientists discovered a scorching hotspot over 2,700 °C where water molecules are breaking apart. This groundbreaking observation confirms long-held theories about atmospheric chemistry and dynamics on distant, heat-bathed gas giants.
title: NASA’s JWST Produces First-Ever 3D Map of Distant Planet WASP-18b

description: Rockstar Games co-founder, Dan Houser, has explained why Grand Theft Auto games need to be set in the US. Houser said that GTA games are based on Americana and would not work in a setting outside the US.
title: Rockstar Games Co-Founder Says GTA Games Won't Work if Set Outside the US

description: India Post Payments Bank (IPPB), which aims to provide banking services in the remotest regions of India, was unveiled in the country with 650 branches and 3,250 access points. It was first launched by the Prime Minister in September 2018. The IPPB is linked to 1.55 lakh post offices in India, allowing Indians to access their savings and current accounts. However, if you do not wish to visit a physical brand or an access point, you can use IPPB's SMS and Missed Call banking services to check your account balance or get a mini bank statement on your phone.
title: How to Check India Post Payments Bank Balance Online via Different Methods

description: India's smartphone market witnessed a year-on-year (YoY) growth of 5 percent by volume and 18 percent by value in the third quarter (Q3) of 2025, according to Counterpoint Research's Monthly India Smartphone Tracker. The report highlights that this marks a value-led shift in consumer behaviour. Moreover, Apple has entered the list of the top five smartphone makers in India by volume. The Cupertino company also topped the list in terms of wholesale market share by value, witnessing robust demand for its iPhone 16 and iPhone 15 models.
title: India’s Smartphone Shipments Grew 5 Percent YoY in Q3 2025; Apple Enters List of Top 5 Phone Makers: Counterpoint

description: Iran’s electricity regulator has revealed that 95 percent of the country’s 427,000 Bitcoin mining machines operate without licences, consuming over 1,400 megawatts of subsidised power daily. Authorities have shut down 104 illegal farms and seized 1,465 devices in Tehran Province alone. A new public-reporting scheme offers cash rewards to citizens identifying unlicensed miners as officials attempt to protect the national grid and stabilise energy supplies.
title: Iran Tackles Unauthorised Crypto Mining After 95 Percent of Bitcoin Mining Devices Found Operating Illegally

description: Poco is reportedly preparing to launch the Poco F8 Pro and F8 Ultra globally, with possible availability in India. Both models recently appeared on IMDA and NBTC certification sites, confirming 5G support and suggesting an imminent debut. The Poco F8 Ultra is expected to be a rebranded Redmi K90 Pro or K90 Pro Max, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, 7,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging, a 120Hz LTPO OLED display, triple 50-megapixel rear cameras, and an IP69-rated body.
title: Poco F8 Ultra, Poco F8 Pro Global Launch Around the Corner, Tipster Claims

description: Red Magic 11 Pro has been launched in global markets outside China by the ZTE sub-brand. Nubia. The new gaming-focused smartphone runs on a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip and packs up to 24GB of RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage. The phone is equipped with a 7,5000mAh battery with support for 80W fast charging. It has a smaller battery compared to the Chinese counterpart.
title: Red Magic 11 Pro Launched Globally With Snapdragon Elite Gen 5, Slightly Smaller Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft’s AI chief, Mustafa Suleyman, has dismissed the idea that artificial intelligence can ever be conscious, calling such research “the wrong question.” Speaking at the AfroTech Conference, he said AI cannot experience pain or emotions, and only simulates them. Suleyman, a long-time advocate for “humanist AI,” argued that since AI lacks a pain network, it cannot suffer or deserve rights like humans.
title: Microsoft AI Chief Mustafa Suleyman Calls the Idea of Conscious AI ‘Absurd’: Report

description: Romania’s gambling regulator has blacklisted Polymarket after nearly $600 million (roughly ₹53,200 crore) in crypto wagers were placed during national elections. Officials said the platform operated as unlicensed gambling. The action mirrors global moves by the US, France, and others to curb crypto-based betting platforms.
title: Polymarket Banned By Romanian Regulator for Illegal Crypto Betting Following $600 Million Election Wagers

description: Samsung Galaxy A57 may be released next year as a successor to the Galaxy A56. Ahead of official confirmation, the handset has appeared on the company's internal test servers for the first time. It is expected to ship with the Exynos 1680 SoC. It is likely to be launched in March 2026. It is being tested with internal firmware builds A576BXXU0AYJ7, A576BOXM0AYJ7 and A576BXXU0AYJ7
title: Samsung Galaxy A57 Model Number Reportedly Surfaces on Company's Test Server

description: Arc Raiders launch seems to be a big hit. The extraction shooter has hit a peak concurrent player count of 354,836 on Steam just days after its launch. The multiplayer title is also number one on Steam's Top Sellers list. Arc Raiders is available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X.
title: Arc Raiders Hits Over 300,000 Concurrent Players on Steam After Launch

description: Pairing your smartphone to your smart TV enables a larger screen viewing experience. It enables quickly share content with family or friends without passing your phone around. To connect your phone to a smart TV, you can choose between wireless and wired methods, depending on your device and preference. Here is a step-by-step guide.
title: How to Connect Phone With Smart TV: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Realme has launched the C85 5G and C85 Pro 4G in Vietnam, both featuring 6.8-inch displays, 50-megapixel main cameras, and 7,000mAh batteries with 45W fast charging. The Realme C85 5G is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset with a 144Hz LCD screen, while the Realme C85 Pro 4G uses a Snapdragon 685 chip and an AMOLED panel. Both run Android 15-based Realme UI 6, include 8-megapixel front cameras, IP69-rated builds, VC cooling, and dual speakers.
title: Realme C85 5G, Realme C85 Pro 4G Launched With 7,000mAh Battery: Price, Features

description: Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), often seen as the holy grail of AI, was first popularised in 2005 by Ben Goertzel and Cassio Pennachin through their book Artificial General Intelligence. However, the phrase originated in 1997, when researcher Mark Gubrud used it in a paper describing AI systems capable of human-like reasoning and problem-solving. Since then, AGI has come to symbolise both innovation and existential anxiety in technology.
title: Who Coined the Term 'AGI'? The Real Inventor Finally Identified

description: Looking for a feature-packed smartphone under Rs. 20,000 with an AMOLED display? Top contenders include the Oppo K13 5G, Realme P4 5G, CMF Phone 2 Pro, Infinix Note 50s 5G+, Redmi Note 14 5G, iQOO Z10R 5G, and Tecno Pova Slim 5G. These mid-range models offer vibrant AMOLED screens, up to 50-megapixel cameras, large batteries with fast charging, and 5G connectivity. Each blends style, performance, and visual quality, making them great value options for streaming, gaming, and everyday use.
title: Best Smartphones Under Rs 20,000 With AMOLED Display: Realme P4 5G, CMF Phone 2 Pro, Tecno Pova Slim and More

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, addressing the Emerging Science, Technology and Innovation Conclave (ESTIC) 2025 in New Delhi, said India is shaping a global framework for “ethical and human-centric AI.” He announced a Rs. 1 lakh crore RDI Scheme Fund to boost private R&D and confirmed that India will host the Global AI Summit in February 2026.
title: India Is Shaping a Global Framework for Ethical and Human-Centric AI: PM Modi

description: Oppo Reno 15 lineup, which could succeed the Reno 14 lineup, will reportedly launch in India in December. The rumoured Reno 15 series could feature three models, dubbed Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, and Reno 15 Mini, unlike its predecessor, which offered the standard and the Pro models. Recently, the specifications of the phones had surfaced online, suggesting that they might be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity chipset. The Reno 15 Pro, Reno 15, and Reno 15 Mini could sport 6.78-inch, 6.59-inch, and 6.32-inch displays, respectively.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series India Launch Timeline Leaked; Reno 15 Mini Also Expected to Debut

description: Robin Hood is a new series, now premiering on Prime Video with an MGM+ subscription. It is a fight against the injustice of the Norman conquest.
title: Robin Hood Season 1 Now Streaming on Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know

description: Written and directed by Naveedh S Fareedh, Sotta Sotta Nanaiyuthu is a Tamil comedy drama movie that has finally landed on the digital screens. The movie is currently streaming on Aha Tamil.
title: Sotta Sotta Nanaiyuthu Streaming Now on OTT: Know Where to Watch This Tamil Comedy Drama Movie Online

description: Bitcoin traded nearly $107,400 (roughly Rs. 95.4 lakh) on Monday as broader crypto markets declined amid weak spot demand and macro uncertainty. Altcoins, including Ethereum, Solana, and Dogecoin, also fell, reflecting risk-off sentiment. Analysts noted that despite short-term pressure, Bitcoin's long-term structural strength and on-chain stability remain intact, supported by improved liquidity conditions and sustained institutional interest.
title: Bitcoin Price Drops Below $107,500 Amidst Weakening Spot Demand, Macro Uncertainty

description: Reports suggest that AI browsers like ChatGPT Atlas and Perplexity’s Comet can bypass paywalls by reproducing full articles hidden behind them. The Columbia Journalism Review found that both browsers could generate paywalled text from publications like MIT Technology Review. While Gadgets 360’s tests couldn’t replicate the issue, such behaviour, if true, could further threaten publishers’ ad and subscription revenues.
title: ChatGPT Atlas, Perplexity’s Comet and Other AI Browsers Can Bypass Paywalls: Report

description: Lenovo AI Glasses V1 has been launched in China as the latest smart glasses from Lenovo. It comes with AI-powered features like AI navigation and real-time AI prompting. The Lenovo AI Glasses V1 has dual microphones and dual speakers. The smartglasses weigh just 38 grams and is claimed to deliver up to 10 hours of battery life on a single charge. Lenovo AI Glasses V1 measures 1.8mm thick.
title: Lenovo AI Glasses V1 Launched With Real-Time Translation, Micro LED Displays

description: Realme launched the GT 8 Pro and GT 8 last month. Now, the company has confirmed the arrival of the Realme GT 8 Pro Aston Martin F1 Edition in China. This special edition smartphone will come in Aston Martin's signature green colour. It has a silver wing logo at the back. The specifications of the phone could be similar to the standard Realme GT 8 Pro.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Aston Martin F1 Limited Edition Launch Date, Design Revealed

description: Vivo Y19s 5G has been launched in India by the Chinese smartphone maker. It is the 5G-enabled counterpart of last years Vivo Y19s, which was only available in select markets outside India. The new handset sports a 6.74-inch display with 720x1,600 pixels resolution, 90Hz refresh rate, 260ppi pixel density, and up to 700 nits of peak brightness. It is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity chipset, paired with a 6,000mAh battery. The company has yet to reveal the price of the phone and when it will go on sale in the country. It will be available in three RAM and storage configurations and two colourways.
title: Vivo Y19s 5G Launched in India With 6,000mAh Battery, Dimensity 6300 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: Apple will launch various new products on April 1, 2026, as part of its 50th anniversary celebrations, according to a report. Early next year, the Cupertino company might also unveil the iPhone 17e, the standard iPad with the A18 chip, and the iPad Air with the M4 chip. In June, during Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2026, the company will reportedly announce a revamped AI strategy, too. Apart from this, Apple is expected to launch its first smart home devices, like security cameras, and its first purported foldable phone, dubbed iPhone Fold, in 2026.
title: Apple’s Product Launch Timeline for 2026 Leaked; New iPad Mini, MacBook Air and AI-Powered Siri Expected

description: Dude is a Tamil drama film which stars Pradeep Ranganathan and Mamitha Baiju in the key roles. The movie is releasing on Netflix on Nov. 14th, 2025.
title: Dude OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Pradeep Ranganathan Starrer Movie Online?

description: The Silent Hill 2 remake, which launched on PS5 and PC in 2024, could be coming to Xbox soon. The survival horror game has been rated by the ESRB, with Xbox Series S/X listed as the platform. This suggests Konami could be bringing the game to Xbox soon.
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake's Xbox Series S/X Version Listed on ESRB Website, Suggesting Upcoming Launch

description: Vivo is reportedly gearing up to launch its S50 series in China later this month, following the global debut of the X300 lineup. The series, expected to include the Vivo S50 and S50 Pro Mini, has allegedly cleared China’s SRRC certification, hinting at an imminent launch. The Vivo S50 may feature a 6.59-inch 1.5K OLED display and Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chip, while the S50 Pro Mini could offer a 6.31-inch OLED panel, Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, and a larger battery.
title: Vivo S50, Vivo S50 Pro Mini Reportedly Clear Radio Certification Before Launch in China

description: Apple could offer a major reboot of Siri with the launch of iOS 26.4, expected in spring 2026. According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, the revamped Siri will be partly powered by Google’s Gemini AI. The update could lay the base for Apple's smart home display, along with updated versions of the Apple TV and HomePod mini.
title: Apple Said to Equip Revamped Siri With Gemini-Based AI Model Developed in Collaboration With Google

description: Apple is expected to release iOS 26.1 on November 3, followed by the first iOS 26.2 beta on November 4, according to Mark Gurman. While the iOS 26.1 update introduces a new Tinted option for the Liquid Glass feature, improving readability, the iOS 26.2 beta will likely focus on performance and stability, with major additions likely in later builds. Expected to roll out publicly in December, iOS 26.2 may include US passport support in Apple Wallet and end-to-end encryption for RCS messaging.
title: Apple’s iOS 26.1 Launch Expected This Week Followed By iOS 26.2 Beta Rollout: Report

description: The Fittr Hart X2 Smart Ring is available in India at Rs. 19,499 and competes with some of the leading brands in this space, including Ultrahuman. The Hart Ring is lightweight and is claimed to have up to 8 days of battery life. It is made of titanium with a scratch-resistant coating and is available in Sterling Gold, Frost Silver, and Gunmetal Black finishes. It is a great everyday fitness tracker and offers a distraction-free focus. The smart ring is durable enough to last a long time.
title: Fittr Hart X2 Smart Ring Review: Just Another Tracker?

description: India successfully launched its heaviest GEO communication satellite, CMS-03, aboard the LVM3-M5 rocket. The mission strengthens national communication networks, maritime tracking, and strategic connectivity across the region. Leaders praised ISRO’s achievement, calling it a major step for the country’s growing space capabilities and self-reliance in high-capacity satellite deployment.
title: ISRO Launches India’s Heaviest CMS-03 GEO Communication Satellite

description: Lava has confirmed that the Agni 4 will launch in India and globally on November 20. The phone, teased to feature a MediaTek Dimensity chipset and dual rear cameras, succeeds last year’s Agni 3 5G. Reports suggest it could house a Dimensity 8350 chip, a 7,000mAh battery, and a 120Hz display, with an expected price of around Rs. 25,000.
title: Lava Agni 4 Launch Date Confirmed, Teased to Feature a MediaTek Dimensity Chip

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series could launch by the end of February 2026, a report suggests. The company usually unveils its flagship handset lineup either by late-January or early-February. However, if the leaked launch timeline is true, next year's Galaxy S26 series might see a slightly delayed launch its predecessors. Moreover, this could be Samsung's first event in three years in San Francisco, as the last was held in 2023 for the Galaxy S23 lineup's unveiling.
title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2026 Date Leaked; Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Expected to Launch: Report

description: Apple’s retail stores are reportedly preparing for an “overnight” event on November 11, a routine exercise where employees refresh displays ahead of new launches. According to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman, the move could either be linked to holiday season preparations or hint at upcoming product refreshes, such as the Apple TV and HomePod mini. Apple has not confirmed any new launches.
title: Another Launch? Apple Retail Stores to Reportedly Get New Product Displays Soon

description: OnePlus has announced its proprietary gaming technology, dubbed OP Gaming Core, to tackle the challenges of mobile gaming. It is claimed to combine chip-level optimisations with hardware and software tools to deliver improved control, responsiveness, and stability during mobile gaming. It is supported by the new OnePlus Performance Tri-Chip, which offers an integration of three physical chips, and OP FPS Max, a high-frame-rate gaming solution.
title: OnePlus Unveils OP Gaming Core Technology With HyperRendering and OP FPS Max for OnePlus 15 Series

description: The Sandisk Creator Phone SSD is available in 1TB and 2TB storage options. It comes in a single colour option - Blue, which may get dirty over time. The device targets content creators and solves one of the biggest hassles of space crunch. It also receives a direct-to-drive storage option and an IP65 rating for water and dust resistance. However, it lacks complete waterproofing and better durability ratings. It effortlessly delivers the promised read and write speeds, which can be particularly helpful in everyday video workflows. It is a fantastic no-nonsense device.
title: Sandisk Creator Phone SSD Review: Snap, Shoot, and Edit on the Go

description: 2025 has been a great year for gamers, with a massive wave of blockbuster releases across genres. With the turn of the calendar year approaching, a massive slate of ambitious gaming titles, delivering a mix of high-stakes thrills, espionage, and pure survival horror, is scheduled for release across all the major platforms. From Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 to 007: First Light, here are the top five games to watch out for.
title: Top 5 Upcoming Games to Watch Out For: Call of Duty Black Ops 7, GTA VI, 007 First Light, and More
